üì¢ Have you heard about our monthly bulletins in @angling_times? 

Its a great way of keeping up-to-date with the work of @NWFishEA and our fisheries teams across the country!

Catch up on December's edition here üëâhttps://t.co/HPRLIeTq7j
This morning‚Äôs delightful river shot. The poor souls in the distance had just completed their morning swim. üòû https://t.co/lqosCDjQrL

Our new fish-friendly pumps in the ¬£35m refurbish of Keadby Pumping Station #Lincolnshire operated very well during #StormChristoph and also helped these eels migrate to spawning grounds. #fish #flood @UniOfHull 
https://t.co/HSnPk29obY https://t.co/Dj8t0NjvH1

Our field team is out clearing debris screens across the #NorthEast following last week's #stormchristoph 

Here at Spring Gardens dam at Bishop Auckland, a large amount of woody debris and branches were removed, ensuring the River Gaunless can flow freely. 

#Flood 
#River https://t.co/9gIQRc0DK6

üåäüö® We've launched a new report that calls for urgent action to bring the nation‚Äôs water infrastructure up to date to better cope with extreme #WeatherEvents, #Flooding and #Drought. Find out more here https://t.co/hPI0M86eXv https://t.co/wucCRXS1j4

@SayNo2SizewellC @nocotu @Jennife15046404 @KwasiKwarteng @The_ONR @EnvAgency @theCCCuk And why in this recovery when we are broke would we spend this money for it to flow out of the country and not invest it in our own industries, find our niche and become world leaders.

With the #flood levels starting to fall, #Worcester City Council teams are once again in action - in full PPE - to wash down the riverside paths so that you can start to use them again soon for your daily exercise. https://t.co/oaIxs6eNIQ

We‚Äôre continuing with work to replace the gate on the #Foss Barrier in #York this week now that river levels have fallen. Here‚Äôs Mark explaining the latest plans to install the gate by the end of the week. https://t.co/i7onQwWAZx @CityofYork @EnvAgency @OliverHarmarEA https://t.co/aJgfHbsWpJ

tweets.text: @johnnyrich @nocotu @Jennife15046404 @KwasiKwarteng @The_ONR @EnvAgency @theCCCuk EDF Sizewell C fails on aims of govt's 25yr #environment plan: air pollution; unsustainable water usage; devastation of designated landscapes/wildlife habitats/marine environment; release of toxic chemicals/ionising radiation; radioactive waste legacy for future generations

@SayNo2SizewellC @nocotu @Jennife15046404 @KwasiKwarteng @The_ONR @EnvAgency @theCCCuk Which breaks a direct promise made to us.  The govt also promised to protect the AONBs yet the destruction of so much protected land and habitats plus the effect on Minsmere and the Sizewell belts and the actual coast line with its waste buried on site seems not to be a factor.

Appearing before the Public Accounts Committee on 14th Jan 2021 Sir James Bevan CEO of the @EnvAgency said "Almost by definition, we are not allowing people to discharge sewage into chalk streams".

Let's just check that statement shall we. https://t.co/tAAPJW9Wge

challenges in relation to water, farming &food production and the importance of working together to find solutions against a backdrop of climate change https://t.co/134h2vGMPu

urls.title: Get Involved | Yorkshire & Humberside Climate Commission
urls.description: Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission is an independent, evolving organisation that will develop over the next few months. We are currently recruiting for a Chair - applications for Commissioners have now closed. We are seeking to appoint a Chair for the Commission, an individual with a proven track record in leadership who can demonstrate an in-depth understanding of the climate emergency and the potential responses to it within the region. In line with the Commission‚Äôs objectives, they should have a

tweets.text: If the the @EnvAgency CEO @JamesBevanEA is not aware that sewage is discharged into chalk streams what chance have we got. The @RiverChess has had 79 sewage discharges over a 16 month period between 24 Sept 2019 and 25th Jan 2021.

@EnvAgencySE @Sacha4Dartford @RiverMillSchool @Kent_cc @CleanerDartford @guardianeco @KentMessenger @TheSun @DefraGovUK @JonathonHawkes @Dartford_CA @Dartford_Labour @welovedartford Contacted @CleanerDartford & gone 4 a walk with @CleanerDartford Reported since January 2020 & again in August 2020.
